UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Large-Scale Screening of Antifungal Peptides Based on Quantitative Structure–Activity Relationship
Literature.Author: Zhang J, Yang L, Tian Z, Zhao W, Sun C, Zhu L, Huang M, Guo G, Liang G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=14.23µM),Candida krusei IFM 56881(MIC=56.92µM),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=7.12µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=14.23µM)
